title: FS (Another price cut) - 2 Evers Portrait & w/Bat Cubs PSA and Walsh SGC
author: iwantitiwinit

posts.post_title: FS (Another price cut) - 2 Evers Portrait & w/Bat Cubs PSA and Walsh SGC
posts.post_content:
For Sale (Another price cut) - Two Johnny Evers PSA graded and Walsh SGC, no creases. Price includes shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.

T206 Johnny Evers Portrait SC 150/30 - PSA 3   $690 venmo or zelle, $715 if you prefer pp gs.

T206 Johnny Evers with Bat, Cubs on Shirt P150 - PSA 3   $680 venmo or zelle, $700 if you prefer pp gs.

T206 Ed Walsh P150 - SGC 3  SOLD.

Note: NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover NC ST.
Bump for price reductions and card added.
